extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite DEVS100 & DEVS230 & DEVS240
Exclusion  No more than 3.0 units from DEVS340/3.0/POLS346/3.0

basic.description: Provides students with an overview of theories that underpin the development enterprise, and critiques of development, through the use of primary texts and critical appraisals.
basic.subject: DEVS
basic.title: Theories of Development
